sentence.Network_en: The smallest tactical unit in the Roman army trusted with independent maneuver was the 120 - man maniple.
sentence.Network_cn: 在罗马军队中,最小的战术编队是由120人组成的独立战团.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 后来军团（Legion）取代方阵，而军团内还有小队（Maniples）。除了方阵的制式配备盔、盾、矛、剑以外，还有金属头标枪。
manioc 树薯maniple 饰带manipulable 可以操作的
年龄在 25 到 30 岁之间的连队（maniple）组成，称为 hastati。有一定的战斗经验，组成军团的第一横列。

list.abs: many institutions , from neolithic villages to the maniples of the Roman army , seem to be organised around the Dunbar number .从新石器时代的村落，到罗马军团中队，许多机构都似乎是围绕邓巴人数来组建。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in sense 2): from Old French maniple, from Latin manipulus 'handful, troop', from manus 'hand' + the base of plere 'fill'
